Title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
Writer: Matthew Fogel (screenplay), Don Rhymer (story), Matthew Fogel (story), Darryl Quarles (characters)
Actors: Martin Lawrence, Brandon T. Jackson, Jessica Lucas, Michelle Ang
Plot: Malcolm Turner and his stepson Trent go undercover at an all-girls school to flush out a killer.
Production: The Collective, New Regency Pictures, Friendly Films, Runteldat Entertainment
